contextId.information: AT: "if they had truly listened to me" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_hypo]])
contextId.quote: if they had stood in my council meeting

contextId.information: This is a hypothetical situation that Yahweh never expects to be true. AT: "I have established ... and I have fixed ... so I will never reject ... and I will bring" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_hypo]])
contextId.quote: If I have not established ... and if I have not fixed ... then I will reject ... and not bring
